ChromaStatic.color: fn(a: number, b: number, c: number, colorSpace?: string) -> Color
ChromaStatic.rgb: fn(red: number, green: number, blue: number, alpha?: number) -> Color
ChromaStatic.hsl: fn(hue: number, saturation: number, lightness: number, alpha?: number) -> Color
ChromaStatic.hsv: fn(hue: number, saturation: number, value: number, alpha?: number) -> Color
ChromaStatic.lab: fn(lightness: number, a: number, b: number, alpha?: number) -> Color
ChromaStatic.lch: fn(lightness: number, chroma: number, hue: number, alpha?: number) -> Color
ChromaStatic.gl: fn(red: number, green: number, blue: number, alpha?: number) -> Color

Color.name: fn() -> string
Color.interpolate: fn(color: Color, f: number, mode?: string) -> Color
